Detailed Description

This struct defines the parameters for geomtery of the sinogram
Parameters:
type "data", "corrected", "expected", "attenuation", "randoms" "scatter", "subset-specific"
nr Number of radial bins in sinogram
nphi Number of azimuthal-angular bins in sinogram
numSinos Number of sinograms. If numSinos > 1, creates multiple "slice" sinograms if max_zmid > min_zmid, or makes multiple "angle" sinograms, upper range of zmid values
max_zmid If numSinos > 1, upper range of zmid values
min_zmid If numSinos > 1, lower range of zmid values
maxTheta If numSinos > 1, lower range of theta values
minTheta If numSinos > 1, lower range of theta values
enable if true, do bother to generate sinograms
updateIteration[SCATTER_UPDATE_ARR_LEN] list of iteraration to generate sinos
verbosity level of output
